glyphCode.description: Canonical glyph identifier in uppercase notation.

cfg_soft.description: Soft grammar preferences applied before canonical automaton rules.

window.description: History window inspected to avoid short-term glyph repetitions.

avoid_repeats.description: Glyph codes that should be substituted when repeated inside the window.

fallbacks.description: Mapping of glyph codes to their explicit substitution when repetition is detected.

force_dnfr.description: Minimum |ΔNFR| normalised score that bypasses soft filtering.

force_accel.description: Minimum acceleration normalised score that bypasses soft filtering.

cfg_canon.description: Canonical grammar thresholds enforced by the automaton.

enabled.description: Toggle canonical grammar enforcement during metric runs.

zhir_requires_oz_window.description: Window requiring a DISSONANCE glyph before a MUTATION.

zhir_dnfr_min.description: Minimum normalised |ΔNFR| required to allow MUTATION without recent DISSONANCE.

thol_min_len.description: Minimum number of THOL glyphs before canonical closure is allowed.

thol_max_len.description: Maximum number of THOL glyphs tolerated before forcing closure.

thol_close_dnfr.description: Upper bound on normalised |ΔNFR| that triggers THOL closure.

si_high.description: Sense index threshold: Si at or above this resolves THOL closures with silence; lower Si forces contraction.
